product_name: Osprey Insulated Hose with Bite Valve
long_description: Take your Osprey Hydraulics(TM) reservoir (sold separately) out in winter weather with this insulated hose and bite valve. Heat-reflective closed-cell foam sleeve insulates from the cold too help prevent water inside the hose from freezing. Insulated hose and bite valve work with any Osprey Hydraulics reservoir. Includes a sternum strap.
short_description: Take your Osprey Hydraulics(TM) reservoir (sold separately) out in winter weather with this insulated hose and bite valve.
